meanings.sent2: He waved and said cheerio as he left the room.
meanings.sent3: After finishing his meal, he exclaimed cheerio to his empty plate.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the day whispered cheerio to the world.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful cheerio echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.sent1: She greeted her friend with a cheerful cheerio.
meanings.sent2: The children exchanged cheerios before starting their game.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed a little cheerio to the passing dog.
meanings.sent4: The colorful balloons seemed to say cheerio to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful cheerio brightened up the room instantly.
